info.name: Artificer — Arcane Sniper (MLG)
info.description: Artificer Specialist focused on an Arcane Rifle and Flow-powered Telum Magicaes. Rebuilt to use Aurora’s “supports + select” pattern exactly like Fighter Battle Master Maneuvers.
info.author: Barumars

description.p: You engineer an Arcane Rifle and fuel devastating Telum Magicaes with your personal reservoir, Flow. This file mirrors the Battle Master maneuver structure so shot selection and display work flawlessly.

sheet.description: Magitech marksmanship with Flow-powered Telum Magicaes.

description.p: You craft an Arcane Rifle. While wielding it, you ignore the Loading property of firearms and may use Intelligence instead of Dexterity for your firearm attack and damage rolls. The rifle counts as a spellcasting focus for your artificer spells.

sheet.description: Arcane Rifle: ignore Loading; may use INT for firearm attack & damage; firearm counts as focus.

description.p: You have Flow points equal to your INT modifier (min 1). Long rest restores all Flow.
Telum Magicaes. When you hit with a firearm attack, you can spend 1 Flow to apply an Telum Magicae you know. Save DC = 8 + PB + INT mod.
Slot Exchange. Bonus action: convert a spell slot to Flow equal to slot level (temporary Flow; lost on long rest).

sheet.description: Flow = INT mod (min 1), long rest. Spend 1 on hit to apply a known Telum Magicae (DC {{telum-magicae:dc}}). Bonus: convert a slot → Flow equal to slot level.

description.p: You gain proficiency with firearms. As an action you can repair or clear a misfire from a firearm you hold by spending 1 Flow or 10 minutes of tinkering.

sheet.description: Repair/clear misfire (spend 1 Flow or 10 min).

description.p: You learn two Telum Magicaes at 3rd level and one additional at 6th, 11th, and 15th level. You can apply only one Telum Magicae to each attack.

sheet.description: Known shots: 2 (+1 at 6/11/15). One shot per attack.

description.p: Once per turn when you spend Flow on a firearm hit, add extra damage equal to your INT modifier.

sheet.description: Once/turn when you spend Flow: +INT mod damage.

description.p: 1 minute to establish a vantage point: you gain light cover, +1 to firearm attacks, and advantage on sight-based Perception until you move.

sheet.description: 1-min setup: light cover nest, +1 firearm attacks, Perception (sight) adv. until you move.

description.p: Ignore half cover with firearm attacks; reduce misfire threshold by 1 (min 1).

sheet.description: Ignore ½ cover; misfire threshold −1 (min 1).

description.p: Gain darkvision 60 ft. (or +60 ft. if you have it) and advantage on Perception checks to spot targets at long range with your firearm.

sheet.description: Darkvision 60 ft. (or +60). Perception adv. at long range.

description.p: On a firearm hit, force a WIS save (DC {{telum-magicae:dc}}). On failure, the creature’s speed is 0 until the start of your next turn. You may apply this once per turn without spending Flow.

sheet.description: On hit: WIS save (DC {{telum-magicae:dc}}) or speed 0 till your next turn; once/turn free.

description.p: Increase your firearm’s damage die by one step (d8→d10, d10→d12). Ignore three-quarters cover with firearm attacks.

sheet.description: +1 die step to firearm damage; ignore ¾ cover.

description.p: When you spend Flow on a shot, the target also takes +1d6 force damage.

sheet.description: Whenever you spend Flow on a shot: +1d6 force.

description.p: Reaction when a creature in your firearm’s normal range makes an attack: make one firearm attack. On a hit, your target’s attack is made at disadvantage and it takes extra damage equal to your PB.

sheet.description: Reaction: firearm attack vs attacker; on hit give their attack disadvantage and +PB damage.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow on a hit: target makes a CON save (DC {{telum-magicae:dc}}) or can’t cast spells until end of its next turn. On success, it has disadvantage on concentration checks from this hit.

sheet.description: On hit spend 1 Flow: CON save or no spells till end of its next turn (success: conc. disadv.).

description.p: Spend 1 Flow on a hit to ignore the target’s resistances to this attack and treat its AC as 2 lower for the hit.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: ignore resistances; AC −2 for this hit.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: target CON save or speed −10 ft. and disadvantage on STR/DEX checks until end of its next turn.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: CON save or −10 ft. speed, STR/DEX checks disadv. till end of next turn.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: target WIS save or can’t take reactions and has disadvantage on opportunity attacks until end of its next turn.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: WIS save or no reactions; OA at disadvantage.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: 10-ft. burst centered on the target; DEX save or 2d6 fire damage (half on success).

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: 10-ft. burst, DEX save; 2d6 fire (½ on success).

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: target sheds bright light 10 ft., dim 10 ft. more and can’t benefit from invisibility until your next turn ends.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: reveal target (light 10/10); no invisibility benefit.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow vs a metal-clad/holding target: +2d6 fire; CON save or it drops one metal item if possible.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: +2d6 fire; CON save or drop a held metal item.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: if the target is frightened or paralyzed, treat the hit as a critical. Otherwise add +1d6 damage of the attack’s type.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: vs frightened/paralyzed treat as crit; else +1d6 same damage type.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow before the roll to attack with advantage; if both dice would hit, deal +1d6 force.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow pre-roll: advantage; if both hit, +1d6 force.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: you or an ally within 30 ft. gains temp HP = INT mod + PB.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: temp HP (you/ally within 30 ft.) = INT mod + PB.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: target CON save or is stunned until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: CON save or stunned till your next turn.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: +1d6 cold; target DEX save or speed becomes 0 until end of its next turn.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: +1d6 cold; DEX save or speed 0 till end of next turn.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: target CON save or is poisoned until the end of its next turn; on success it takes +1d6 poison only.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: CON save or poisoned (EoNT); success: +1d6 poison.

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: the bullet continues in a 30-ft. line beyond the target; creatures in the line make a DEX save or take the attack’s damage (half on success).

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: 30-ft. line beyond target; DEX save or take damage (½ on success).

description.p: Spend 1 Flow: after a hit you can make an additional attack roll against a second creature within 15 ft. of the original target.

sheet.description: Spend 1 Flow: extra attack vs creature within 15 ft. of target.

description.p: Ammunition (range 30/350), Two-Handed, Misfire 2, Magical, Spellcasting Focus
Ammunition (range 15/400–450), Two-Handed, Misfire 1, Magical, Spellcasting Focus
